About me

I’m a chemical engineer with over 10 years of experience working in the oil and gas industry. My professional interests include flow assurance, data science, statistics, and programming in the Wolfram Language and Python. My personal interests include college football, physical fitness, and cooking.

Code

  • ggplot (for Wolfram Language): This is a Wolfram Language implementation of the popular R package called ggplot. It’s one of my favorite side projects, but unfortunately I don’t get as much time to work on it as I would like.
  • wl2md: Converts a Mathematica notebook into a Markdown notebook. It’s essentially a re-write of the m2md package (link), as I wanted a little more control over the code base and implementation.
  • andrew-yule: Repository for the majority of the content that makes up this website.

Publications and Presentations
